Class DisplayFacade

    Display, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class DisplayFacade
extends DisplayImpl
    On the computer with the channel selector, this is the way you talk to a remote Dynamic Display
    Author:
    Elliott McCrory, Fermilab AD/Instrumentation, 2013
